If you are even slightly hesitating about booking one of Tammy's Airbnbs, why? What are you waiting for? A sign from Heaven? There aren't any strange smells or peculiar candle scents‚Äîjust an overall pleasant and clean-smelling scent and sensation as you enter. What's more, do you know that good, warm and cozy feeling you get when something is clean? I mean, really clean? You get that, too. It doesn't just look clean, it IS clean and it FEELS clean. Tammy's Airbnbs provides everything you need or want for those desiring a shorter stay, and it's even fully equipped for those looking for a longer stay. The bedrooms are equipped with the famous Serta and/or Nectar mattresses, respectively, as well as a lot of thought and attention to detail being put into the furnishings, decor, and overall style of the spaces. The entire place is inviting, welcoming, and you're tempted to never leave; never get out. Check-in is a breeze, parking is super easy‚Äî2 dedicated spaces‚Äîand there's even a back patio setup for grilling and hanging outside; day or night! There is no cable tv, but that's NOT a detriment! There's more to life and getaways than surfing meaningless tv channels. Besides, who needs cable when you have NETFLIX and the ability to stream your favorite content through all the various streaming channels? Just turn the tv on, find the app you're looking for, sign in and you're good to go! One could go on about the space, but the host...! Wow. Just wow. They don't make 'em like Tammy anymore and truly, she is a precious gem of a host. If there's anything you need, she's there. She is so welcoming, so friendly, so kind, so considerate, and extremely gracious. There is a reason Airbnb has dubbed her a "SUPER HOST." So, what are you doing still reading my review?! Get yourself to booking! :-) :-)
